full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` CHOS SKYONG DREG PA LCAM SRING GI TSOGS MCHOD BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING LA MCHOD TSOGS 'BUL BA'I KHYER BDE BA 'DI NI, JANG JONG CHEN WANG GI MNGA' 'BANGS TSUL KHRIMS RNAMS DAG MI PHYED PA'I DAD PA DANG LDAN PA SMYUNG GNAS PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG SHES RAB DANG GSO CES GYI BLO RIG DANG LDAN PA MED CHE BLO BZANG NGAG DBANG DANG DGE SLONG BLO BZANG SANGS RGYAS RNAMS NAN TAN GYIS BSKUL BA'I NGO @006B BSRUNG BA'I PHYIR, BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA MTSAN GZHAN BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA'I THA SHAL BA BLO BZANG DGONG MING CAN GYIS CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING DANG CHOS SKYONG GZHAN LA TSOGS MCHOD 'BUL BA'I CHO GA MI THONG ZHING, BLA MA YI DAM RNAMS KYIS TSOGS MCHOD YID SHES KYIS, 'GRON PA BRIS PA'I 'DI LHAG CHAD MA DAG PA DANG TSUL MIN PA'I NYES SKYON GZHAN THAMS CAD BLA MA LHA TSOGS DANG, KHYAD PAR LCAM SRING 'KHOR BCAS LA BZOD PAR GSOR BA, SGRIB PAR MI 'GYUR BAR MDZAD DU GSOL, GAL TE LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD YOD NA NGES BDAG SOGS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYI DAM TSIG NYAMS PAR SDIG SGRIB RNAMS KYANG ZHING DAG NAS, BSTAN 'GRO PHAN DON DU MCHOG MTHUN @007A *, ,GYI DNGOS GRUB THOB PA'I RGYU RU BSNGO, ,LEGS SO, ,DGE'O, ,)
